data.name: Warhammer Underworlds: Online - Cosmetics: Relics of the Founders
data.detailed_description:
The haunted streets of Shadespire have attracted many disparate souls, none more so than those trapped from the very beginning. Noble souls and savage brutes are stuck in an endless cycle of violence, clashing together as each attempts to escape damnation. Unlock the Relics of the Founders in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.

Please note: This DLC contains items that were given to players during Early Access. If you purchased the game during Early Access, you already own this content.

WARBAND SKINS

  • The Anvils of the Heldenhammer (for use with Steelheart’s Champions)
  • The Black Spikes (for use with Magore’s Fiends)
  • The Night Legion (for use with Sepulchral Guard)
  • The Kryptboyz (for use with Ironskull’s Boyz)
  • The Veiled Skean (for use with Spiteclaw’s Swarm)
  • The Anvils of the Heldenhammer (for use with The Farstriders)

Please note: In order to use the skins you must first own the associated warband DLC. If you do not own the warband DLC at purchase, the items will be stored in your inventory and will unlock when an associated DLC warband purchase is made.

data.short_description: The haunted streets of Shadespire have attracted many disparate souls, none more so than those trapped from the very beginning. Unlock the Early Access skins in Warhammer Underworlds: Online now.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD FX-4350 @ 4.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
